column5: Greetings,My friend and I recently heard about Echoing Lake Outfitters in NW Ontario. We believe it is fairly close to the border with Manitoba. We are interested in this lodge in view of lake trout fishing and possibly moose hunting. Unfortunately, we have been having trouble reaching this business.Does anyone know the status of Echoing Lake Outfitters?Kindest regards.....
A recent post that answers your questions:https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...d.php?t=623593
Mike,Many sincere thanks for the link. I remembered the thread the moment that I opened the link. I just didn't make the connection on my own.Kindest regards...
